summary:
Modified sexy Jenassa Replacer AND Stand alone follower.
3 Different Hair Styles (ApachiiHair).
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img] http://oi49.tinypic.com/2nb4vvm.jpg [/img][/center]
[b][u]UPDATE! Version 1.1 out now for all hairstyles ! - Endorse if you like :)[/u][/b]

This mod simply replaces Jenassa with a young, cute, red-haired Redguard companion who is aswell:

? Essential
? Marriable
? Combat Assassin
? Sneak, Dual flurry and some other perks
? Auto-Level is enabled up to level 100.
? Ignores crimes now more like a hired mercenary would
and more... + Now she's a good looking Redguard!

[b]She is still found in Whiterun but now starts out with Elven daggers aswell as some studded armour.[/b]

[b]Also added non-replacer mods for your enjoyment which are all standalone, with:[/b]

- Same looks and everything, just as stand alone mods.
- All versions are found in Dead Man's drink (the inn) in Falkreath.
- Tip: do "help jenna 4" in console for their ID number then input "player.placeatme 'number' " into the console.
- Removed Hireling cost, now follows you with her free will


[b]INSTALL;[/b]
- Install manually or via NMM and activate the .esp located in skyrim/data folder
- Overwrite if asked to
- Load after UFO to avoid mishaps

[b]REQUIREMENTS; [/b]
- Skyrim 1.5+
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168] Apachii's awesome hairstyles[/url]


[b] » RECOMMENDED MODS: [/b]
[i]She will use what ever body/face mods you have installed but these I used in screenshots:[/i]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Optional Hair Colours aswell from Apachii[/url]
- A BodyMod like CBBE, UNP/B, TBBE, ADEC, CHSBHC ...
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6953]BFG - Better FaceGen[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7897]Envision Face[/url] / [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28645]Nuska Female Face[/url]

[i]Or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887]Pretty Face[/url] [/i]

[b]OPTIONAL MODS I USED(Not needed but improves visuals);[/b]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19666]Fair Skin Complexion.[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13377]Sporty Sexy Map textures if you like a more buff/tough look. Also contains a oily glossy version for CBBE.[/url]
- An ENB, I used [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23812]Seasons of Skyrim ENB.[/url]

[i]
CHANGE LOG;
v 1.1 Replacer & standalone updated
? Sorted most issues with UFO.
? Nerfed her a bit so she's not that OP at low level (starts at level 3).
? Bit lighter skin colour.
? Added Optional Hair 2 for replacer mod aswell.
? Ignores crimes now like break-in
? Removed hireling cost from standalone mod

v 1.0
Standalone's updated and tweaked.
? Added 'Jen" with Optional hairstyle 2.
? Changed voice to Female-Sultry.
? Minor perk and other fixes.
? Starts now with Studded Armor, an amulet and Elven daggers.
? Also added some gold to her inventory ;)

v 0.2
? Adjusted weight to 65, scale still 1.01
? Slightly darkened the hair colour
? Numbers tweaked, like 90% xp gain of the player.

v 0.1
? Initial release
[/i]

[i][size=2][b]TROUBLESHOOTING;[/b][/size]
- Disband her from your group before enabling mod.
- MAKE A SAFE SAVE-GAME always before adding new mods
- Load order 30-60 index.
- Incase of a dark head / discoloured head; try input SetNPCWeight "65" and SetScale "1.01" values into console THEN Save Game and exit, then restart game and load the save.
- If you see no changes: Look if you have bEnableFileSelection=1 in your SkyrimPrefs.ini file under [Launcher], it NEEDS to be added/changed for any mods to function.
- If you have issues updating from first version to newest, deactivate them from launcher -> delete the old version and do fresh install of newest version.
- If you're having issues uninstalling and restoring her vanilla look remove the .ESP then
texturesactorscharacterfacegendatafacetintskyrim.esm�00B9982.dds
AND
meshesactorscharacterfacegendatafacegeomskyrim.esm�00B9982.nif

[/i]


[center]

[b] » MY OTHER MODS: [/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22067]
[img]http://oi45.tinypic.com/2rolysh.jpg[/img]
Yumi - new Warrior follower ![/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19193]
[img]http://oi49.tinypic.com/30dcivr.jpg[/img]
Laluna - Mage Follower[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19554]
[img]http://oi50.tinypic.com/jq6v7n.jpg[/img]
Damius the Mercenary [/url]

More images of my char's and Laluna on my profile: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2264684]Click.[/url]


____________________________________________________________________

Creds to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/283148]Apachii's[/url] Hairstyles
and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2753566] foretrenty [/url] for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4554] NPC-Editor [/url]
[/center]
author: timek
